bio:
Captain Avidius, a Redguard man, is the captain of The Katariah. The Katariah is the personal flagship of Emperor Titus Mede the Second. The Karariah is currently anchored in the Solitude harbor.
Avidius can be found inside the captain's cabin of the ship, and he carries the Katariah Master Key, which unlocks the Emperor's Quarters within the ship. He has dark hair and a beard.
name: Captain Avidius
